title: Samsung Galaxy Watch
content:
{{Short description|Smartwatch by Samsung}} {{About|the smartwatch introduced in 2018|later devices|Samsung Galaxy Watch series}} {{for|the mobile phone known as SCH-R810|Samsung R810 Finesse}} {{Use dmy dates|date=October 2020}} {{Infobox information appliance | name = Samsung Galaxy Watch (SM-R800/R810) | logo = | logo_size = | logo_alt = | logo caption = | image = File:Samsung Galaxy Watch.jpg | image_size = | alt = | caption = | developer = [[Samsung Electronics]] | manufacturer = [[Samsung Electronics]] | family = [[Samsung Galaxy Watch series]] | type = [[Smartwatch]] | generation = | release date = 9 August 2018 (US) | lifespan = | discontinued = | units sold = | units shipped = | media = | os = | power = | soc = | cpu = | CPUspeed = | memory = | RAMtype = | storage = | memory card = | display = | graphics = | sound = | input = | controllers = | camera = | touchpad = | currentfw = | platform = | online service = | dimensions = | weight = | top game = | compatibility = | predecessor = [[Samsung Gear S3]]
[[Samsung Gear Sport]] | successor = [[Samsung Galaxy Watch 3]] | related = [[Samsung Galaxy Watch Active]] | website = [https://www.samsung.com/global/galaxy/galaxy-watch/ Official website] }} [[File:Samsung Galaxy Watch Black.jpg|thumb|right|A black Galaxy Watch]] The '''Samsung Galaxy Watch''' is a [[smartwatch]] developed by [[Samsung Electronics]]. It was announced on 9 August 2018.{{Cite news|url=https://www.techradar.com/news/samsung-gear-s4|title=Samsung Galaxy Watch release date, price, news and features|work=TechRadar|access-date=9 August 2018}}{{Cite news|url=https://www.androidcentral.com/samsung-galaxy-watch|title=Samsung Galaxy Watch rumors: Release date, specs, price, and features!|date=6 August 2018|work=Android Central|access-date=9 August 2018}}{{Cite web|url=https://mobilenet.cz/clanky/samsung-pracuje-na-hodinkach-gear-s4-potesit-maji-podporou-lte-35067|title=Samsung neúmyslně odhalil podobu chystaných Galaxy Watch – 5× aktualizováno {{!}} mobilenet.cz|last=s.r.o.|first=24net|website=mobilenet.cz|date=24 July 2018 |language=cs-CZ|access-date=9 August 2018}}{{Cite news|url=https://samsungmagazine.eu/2018/08/08/samsung-oficialne-prozradil-datum-predstaveni-hodinek-galaxy-watch/|title=Samsung oficiálně prozradil datum představení hodinek Galaxy Watch|last=LetemSvětemApplem.com|first=LetemSvětemApplem.eu|date=8 August 2018|work=Samsung Magazine|access-date=9 August 2018|language=cs-CZ}}{{Cite news|url=https://www.pocket-lint.com/smartwatches/news/samsung/145148-samsung-galaxy-watch-release-date-specs-details|title=Samsung Galaxy Watch specs, release date, news and rumours|date=7 August 2018|work=Pocket-lint|access-date=9 August 2018}}{{Cite news|url=https://gadgets.ndtv.com/mobiles/news/samsung-galaxy-note-9-launch-live-stream-watch-online-price-specifications-announcement-1897983|title=Samsung Galaxy Note 9 With Upgraded S Pen Launched: Live Updates|work=NDTV Gadgets360.com|access-date=9 August 2018}}{{Cite news|url=https://www.t3.com/news/samsung-galaxy-watch-live-stream-how-to-watch-samsung-unpacked|title=Samsung Galaxy Watch live stream: watch the Samsung Unpacked event right here|work=T3|access-date=9 August 2018}}{{Cite news|url=https://www.svetandroida.cz/chytre-hodinky-galaxy-watch/|title=Hodinky Galaxy Watch potvrzeny. Samsung je poodhalil na vlastním webu|date=24 July 2018|work=Svět Androida|access-date=9 August 2018|language=cs-CZ}}{{Cite news|url=https://news.samsung.com/global/stay-connected-no-matter-where-you-are-with-the-new-samsung-galaxy-watch|title=Samsung may have just accidentally leaked its upcoming smartwatch, the Galaxy Watch – here's everything we've heard about it so far|work=Business Insider|access-date=9 August 2018}} The Galaxy Watch was scheduled for availability in the United States starting on 24 August 2018, at select carriers and retail locations in South Korea on 31 August 2018, and in additional select markets on 14 September 2018.{{Cite news|url=https://techcrunch.com/2018/08/09/this-is-samsungs-new-galaxy-watch/|title=This is Samsung's new Galaxy Watch|work=TechCrunch|access-date=10 August 2018}} On 27 February 2021, Shortly after the Galaxy Watch Active2 and Galaxy Watch3 received an update unlocking the [[Electrocardiography|ECG]] feature for the European countries, Samsung is now delivering Galaxy Watch3-intrinsic features to the original Galaxy Watch and Watch Active.{{Cite web|title=Samsung Galaxy Watch and Watch Active get Watch3 features with Tizen 5.5|url=https://www.gsmarena.com/samsung_galaxy_watch_and_watch_active_get_watch3_features_with_tizen_55-news-47976.php|website=[[Gsmarena]]}} == Specifications == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Model ! colspan="2" |Galaxy Watch !Source |- |+ !Size !42 mm !46 mm | rowspan="17" | {{Cite web|url=https://news.samsung.com/global/stay-connected-no-matter-where-you-are-with-the-new-samsung-galaxy-watch-2|title=Stay Connected No Matter Where You Are with the New Samsung Galaxy Watch|website=news.samsung.com|access-date={{format date|2018|08|09}}}} |- ! Colors | Midnight Black, Rose Gold || Silver |- !Display |1.2[[inch|"]] (30 m[[metre|m]]) |1.3" (33 mm) |- !Resolution | colspan="2" |360 x 360 pixels |- !Part No. !SM-R815 !SM-R805 |- !Glass | colspan="2" |Corning Gorilla Glass DX+ |- !Processor | colspan="2" |[[Exynos]] 9110 [[Multi-core processor|dual core]] 1.15 G[[hertz|Hz]] |- !Operating System | colspan="2" |[[Tizen|Tizen (OS 4.0)]] |- !Size |41.9 mm x 45.7 mm x 12.7 mm |46 mm x 49 mm x 13 mm |- !Weight (without strap) |49 [[gram|g]] |63 g |- !Strap Size |20 [[Millimetre|mm]] |22 mm |- !Water Resistance | colspan="2" |5 ATM + IP68 |- ! rowspan="2" | Memory | colspan="2" |LTE version: 1.5 [[Binary prefix#gib|GiB]] [[Random-access memory|RAM]] + 4 GiB [[flash memory]] |- | colspan="2" |Bluetooth version: 768 [[Binary prefix#mib|MiB]] RAM + 4 GiB flash memory |- !Connectivity | colspan="2" | * [[3G]]/[[LTE (telecommunication)|LTE]] with [[Subscriber identity module#MFF|eSIM]] (Galaxy Watch LTE-Version only) * [[Bluetooth]] 4.2 * [[Wi-Fi]] b/g/n * [[Near-field communication|NFC]] * [[Assisted GPS|A-GPS]], [[GLONASS]] |- !Sensors | colspan="2" | * [[Microelectromechanical systems|MEMS]] [[Accelerometer]] * MEMS [[Vibrating structure gyroscope#MEMS gyroscopes|Gyroscope]] * MEMS [[Barometer#MEMS Barometers|Barometer]] * [[Electro-optical sensor]] (for heart rate monitoring) * [[Photodetector]] (for ambient light) |- !Battery |270 m[[Ampere hour|Ah]] (up to 4 days) |472 mAh (up to 7 days) |} == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == *[https://news.samsung.com/global/stay-connected-no-matter-where-you-are-with-the-new-samsung-galaxy-watch-2 Galaxy Watch on Samsung Newsroom] {{Samsung Galaxy wearables}} {{Smartwatch}} [[Category:Consumer electronics brands]] [[Category:Products introduced in 2018]] [[Category:Smartwatches]] [[Category:Samsung wearable devices]]
